mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Clarysville Hospital. Civil War Records of Samuel West, Physician
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Floro, Zachariah C.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Floro, Zachariah C. Patient Age: 37. Marital Status: Married. Diagnosis: Gun shot fracture left arm. Also fracture of the cartilage sternal extremity of the 2 and fracture of center third of the 3 rib caused by cars. Location Wounded: Charlestown, VA near Martinsburg [Charles Town, WV. Date Wounded: 1864/02/11. Nature of Wound: Conical bullet. Result: Deserted 1865/05/08. Committed a rape on a woman near Pompy Smash. .
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Floro, Zachariah C.
Gun shot fracture left arm. Also fracture of the cartilage sternal extremity of the 2 and fracture of center third of the 3 rib caused by cars
